programmes.show_description: Oscar Pistorius. On Valentine's Day 2013, Oscar Pistorius shot dead his girlfriend, Reeva Steenkamp. He said it was an accident, but does audio and TV footage suggest he was faking? S2, Ep4
John Tanner & Paul Dyson. When John Tanner's fiancée vanishes, he takes part in a reconstruction - is he faking it? Paul Dyson's TV plea for his missing lover raises suspicions. S2, Ep5
Something's Not Right. When 18-year-old Julie Heath goes missing in rural Arkansas, the small town begins a desperate search for her. But no one expects the horror that ensues. S5, Ep2
Operation Goldenrod. In Beirut armed extremists seize a plane and terrorise everyone on board. The CIA undertakes a daring operation to stop the hijackers; but will they succeed? S6, Ep18
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Midnight Raid. After a midnight call out the crew are shocked to find a grim menagerie of hundreds of birds, roosters and dogs. Have they been bred for fighting? S12, Ep1
Out of the Grave. Learn how 20th century techniques encourage people to revisit the past to answer questions and reexamine and solve ancient crimes. S2, Ep7
Infallible Witness. Learn the ways that investigators are always on the cutting edge of new forensic techniques, helping them solve cases and catch criminals more swiftly. S2, Ep8
Death of a Diplomat. The dignity of Embassy Row is shattered as a bomb strapped to the undercarriage of a Chevelle kills a former Chilean ambassador to the US and his wife. S7, Ep7
Deadly Payout. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep8
Judge Rinder shines a light on Britain's worst crimes with unprecedented access to court records, witness interviews, and dramatic reconstructions. S4, Ep1
Too Good To Be True. The future looks bright for Donna Andersen when James Montgomery enters her life. But she soon makes a discovery that turns her marriage into a living nightmare. S1, Ep4
A Bridge Too Far. A couple vanishes after a date and their families unite to locate them. But will their growing desperation and accusations sunder the investigation? S8, Ep11
Room 48. In 2018, three women were held hostage in a motel room. The night ended in the death of Amber Meadows. CCTV reveals to police who pulled the trigger. S9, Ep12
Sante Kimes. Relatives of serial con-woman and murderer, Sante Kimes, reveal how her shocking crimes impacted the family and what it was like having a relative with murder on her mind. S3, Ep3
An Uncomfortable Day. Property developer Robert Pann and trainee nurse Bernice Gray seem like the ideal match. But buried secrets are about to end this picture-perfect romance. S7, Ep14
The Man Who Got Away. In Georgia, Heather Strube looks forward to a bright future with her new boyfriend. But one day, a routine trip to the shopping centre shatters everything. S7, Ep16

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: Goodbye Horses. On Chincoteague Island, a young mother is murdered steps from a vacant summer home. Det. Danny Plott learns she was lured to her death by a mysterious phone call. S1, Ep5
Rolandas Poskus/Amanda Playle. Barrister Robert Rinder examines the case of Rolandas Poskus, a man who was found dead in a park in Hull, and Amanda Playle, a woman who was stalked. S5, Ep3
The Hand-Off. In 2018, 33-year-old Joshua Webb is shot in Beckley, West Virginia. Police unravel a web of lies and follow a trail of shocking security footage to find the culprit. S9, Ep7
They All Saw His Evil. A divorcée starts a relationship with a seemingly kind father. However, she doesn't see what everyone else sees in her new man - that he is a killer. S10, Ep18
Danger In Store. After a bad breakup, a single mum finds love again. But after the couple moves to Florida with her daughter, relationship problems hit a brutal point of no return. S6, Ep8
Murder On VHS. In 1994, a night out in Miami turns deadly for two women and a nightclub owner. Investigators rely on a hidden home video camera to solve the mystery. S8, Ep13
Ian Stewart. Bestselling author, Helen Bailey, was a wealthy widow. After finding love again with Ian Stewart she vanished. He helps in the search - but was it a cover-up? S2, Ep6
Fadi Nasri & Miles Evans. When Nisha Patel-Nasri is stabbed on her doorstep, is her husband, Fadi's TV appeal fake? And Miles Evans is a suspect when his stepdaughter Zoe vanishes. S2, Ep7
Tragedy Comes In Pairs. In the desert town of Socorro, New Mexico, Crystal Houston is found murdered just 14 months after her sister, Stephanie, is killed in a suspicious accident. S5, Ep3
Voice of Terror. In the late 1970s, the FBI had knowledge of anti-Castro terrorists operating in the US. Then, a new group appeared, more violent than their predecessors. S7, Ep1
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Teleshopping.
Undercover Sting. Animal Cops come to the rescue of a desperate cat stuck down a drain deep underground. Plus, they help an abandoned dog in danger of freezing to death. S12, Ep2
From the Ashes. See how arson investigators gather physical evidence and mount undercover and sting operations to crack insurance torchings and arson murders. S2, Ep9
Living in Terror. See how, in the 1993 World Trade Center bombing, DNA was traced to the bomber through the saliva that remained on the back of a mailing label. S2, Ep10
Operation Seaload. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep9

Brothers Betrayed. A closer look at real FBI cases - from murders to robberies - with dramatic re-enactments and interviews with agents and forensic scientists who work in the investigations. S7, Ep11
Michelle Gunshon. In December 2004, 38-year-old Michelle Gunshon went missing. Police believed Michelle had been murdered and that their prime suspect was on the run. S5, Ep1
For Better or for Worse. When Butch Halley finds love with Sunny, he can't wait to start their new life together. But sinister rumours soon threaten to tear the family apart. S1, Ep5
The Long Way Home. 35-year-old mum Deanne Hastings leaves a note that she's running to the store, but never returns. As detectives find more information, troubling theories emerge. S8, Ep13
Nowhere Girl. In 2020, Dioneth Lopez's body turned up in the woodlands of Washington State. Detectives must find surveillance to piece together her final hour. S9, Ep13
Harry Jarvis. Harry Jarvis murdered his wife in the basement. As the truth was revealed, his son, Graham, had to face the fact that his father was a killer. S5, Ep3
Life On The Lake. Gil and his family are living an idyllic existence until an accident changes everything. Just as Gill seems to have moved on, someone close hatches a deadly plot. S7, Ep17
Safe At Home. After years of searching for love, Doris thinks she's finally hit the jackpot with an old friend named Mark. But something dark is taking hold of their marriage. S7, Ep18

programmes.show_name: American Detective With Lt Joe Kenda
programmes.show_description: A former mayor of an Ohio town turns up dead in his hunting cabin. Detective Ryan Allar explores whether this is political retaliation or something more personal. S2, Ep1
Danielle Jones. In 2001, 15-year-old Danielle Jones disappeared on her way to school. Two decades on, her family still fight for justice. S5, Ep6
Toying With Us. In 2013, 35-year-old assistant manager Larry Wells is murdered in his office. Police follow a trail of surveillance footage to track down the disguised killer. S9, Ep8
The Serial Killer Who Only Killed Once. The weekend before Thanksgiving, a killer slays Robin Lawrence at home while her child is asleep. A relentless investigation circles her husband. S9, Ep8
Obsession To Do Evil. On Friday the 13th, a Satan-obsessed teen stalks a Texas town. As bodies fall, survivors fight and cops race to end the nightmare before dawn. S1, Ep1
Ticket To Murder. In Dalton, Georgia, a convenience store employee is stabbed at work. Security footage reveals a disturbing revelation about the killer's identity. S8, Ep15
